SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.selectRoundList */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() <= ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() <= BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() <= ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() <= BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC

SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.getRoundListTotCnt*/ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() <= ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() <= BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() <= ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() <= BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A

SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.selectRoundDtl*/ EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() <= ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() <= BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_IP ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_IP ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey}
SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.selectYearDtl */ MIN(YEAR) AS YEAR FROM CX_EPISD_MST
